pages.text: It did not take long before the idea for a construction plan came to you.$(br2)The organism you came up with is weak, but it seems that your plans to create new life were successful, at least in principle! Admittedly, it is only a clump of microorganisms, but they are alive!

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Every living being has basically the same goals: eat & reproduce.$() So... what do these weak creatures eat? Other Blocks? Definitely something easy to digest.

pages.title: Vegetal
pages.text: The answer seemed to be organics! Easily digestible indeed.$(br)When digested by the organism, an interesting by-product was created that you called Vegetal. It consists of the $(bold)raw energy of nature$().$(br2)You are sure that it will be very useful to you.
